name: Air Hockey 3D
description:
Air Hockey 3D is fun & entertainment for hours!
______________________________________
This Air Hockey game adds a unique twist and level of depth to the Air Hockey sport! The graphics and special effects in this game keep the user entertained for hours and hours. Game is optimized for your newest computer but also runs on older devices!

Compete on different difficulty levels, including Virgin all the way to Stud. You are in a race against the clock to see how quickly you can dispose of your CPU nemesis!

The easy swipe and hit interface offers two different viewing angles, a 2D view, and a simulated 3D view! The advanced physics and 3D sound brings a realistic experience to your computer!

Air Hockey 3D by Apollo Software. Don't miss out on all the fun and excitement!

Features:
* 3D Gameplay or 2D Gameplay
* Special Effects, and Graphics
* 5 levels of varying difficulty
* Unique Jazz/Blues soundtrack
* Dynamics Physics, and sound
